ygData.subject: RE: In Permafrost
ygData.msgSnippet: The damn circlet ain t dropping much... some people I know camped the preacher for about 8 hours and he never dropped it. Last itme I camped it, we waited 6
ygData.messageBody:
The damn circlet ain't dropping much... some people I know camped the
preacher for about 8 hours and he never dropped it. Last itme I camped it,
we waited 6 hours with no circlet (got 3 CIMs though). So, be prepared for a
wait.

And the mammy cloak...heh. It's even worse...

Tis a fun area though! Enjoy!

-Leod, Fennin Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: MFerrulo@... [mailto:MFerrulo@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 08, 1999 5:20 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] In Permafrost


From: MFerrulo@...


Well I'm heading to Permafrost as soon as get my next level (currently
23rd).
I will be seeking the Runed Circlet - a pretty nice head item for Wizards
(rediculous that Verant made yet another Magic user specific head item look
like armor - I want my Pointy hat!!!!!). Perma has two very distinct areas
-
the beginning part that lvls 15 to 30 can do well in and then the harder
part
filled with Timber Wolves and Ice Giants.

Wizaro Wrathcaster
Solusek Ro
